  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.artemis.Entity.addComponent(Component)
    See Entity.edit()
    com.artemis.Entity.addComponent(Component, ComponentType)
    See Entity.edit()
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.added(Entity)
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.added(ImmutableBag)
    com.artemis.World.addEntity(Entity)
    internally managed by artemis
    com.artemis.Entity.addToWorld()
    Automatically managed.
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.changed(Entity)
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.changed(ImmutableBag)
    com.artemis.World.changedEntity(Entity)
    does nothing, internally tracked by artemis now.
    com.artemis.Entity.changedInWorld()
    Automatically managed.
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.check(Entity)
    com.artemis.Entity.createComponent(Class)
    See Entity.edit()
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.deleted(Entity)
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.deleted(ImmutableBag)
    com.artemis.World.deleteManager(Manager)
    A world should be static once initialized
    com.artemis.World.deleteSystem(BaseSystem)
    A world should be static once initialized
    com.artemis.Entity.disable()
    create your own components to track state.
    com.artemis.World.disable(Entity)
    create your own components to track state.
    com.artemis.EntityManager.disabled(Entity)
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.disabled(Entity)
    com.artemis.EntityObserver.disabled(Entity)
    create your own components to track state.
    com.artemis.Entity.enable()
    create your own components to track state.
    com.artemis.World.enable(Entity)
    create your own components to track state.
    com.artemis.EntityManager.enabled(Entity)
    create your own components to track state.
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.enabled(Entity)
    com.artemis.EntityObserver.enabled(Entity)
    create your own components to track state.
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.getActives()
    This method allocates a new Bag each time, refer to EntitySystem.getActives(com.artemis.utils.Bag)
    com.artemis.EntitySystem.getActives(Bag)
    Retrieve the entities from the EntitySubscription directly.
    com.artemis.utils.reflect.Method.getAnnotation(Class)
    com.artemis.utils.reflect.Field.getAnnotation(Class)
    com.artemis.utils.reflect.ClassReflection.getAnnotation(Class, Class)
    com.artemis.Aspect.getAspectForAll(Class...)
    see Aspect.all(Class[])
    com.artemis.Aspect.getAspectForOne(Class...)
    see Aspect.one(Class[])
    com.artemis.Aspect.getEmpty()
    com.artemis.utils.reflect.Method.hasAnnotation(Class)
    com.artemis.utils.reflect.Field.hasAnnotation(Class)
    com.artemis.utils.reflect.ClassReflection.hasAnnotation(Class, Class)
    com.artemis.World.initialize()
    automatically covered by WorldConfiguration.
    com.artemis.Entity.isEnabled()
    use components to implement state instead.
    com.artemis.EntityManager.isEnabled(int)
    create your own components to track state.
    com.artemis.WorldConfiguration.maxRebuiltIndicesPerTick()
    com.artemis.WorldConfiguration.maxRebuiltIndicesPerTick(int)
    All indices are always rebuilt now. This method has no effect.
    com.artemis.Entity.removeComponent(Class)
    See Entity.edit()
    com.artemis.Entity.removeComponent(Component)
    See Entity.edit()
    com.artemis.Entity.removeComponent(ComponentType)
    See Entity.edit()
    com.artemis.systems.DelayedEntityProcessingSystem.restart(float)
    bugged and unnecessary. don't use.
    com.artemis.World.setManager(T)
    WorldConfiguration.setManager(Manager)
    com.artemis.World.setSystem(T)
    com.artemis.World.setSystem(T, boolean)
    WorldConfiguration#setSystem(T, boolean)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.artemis.World(int)
    World.World(WorldConfiguration) provides more fine-grained control.
